name: Templum de Malum OST
detailed_description:
Enjoy the Original Soundtrack of Templum de Malum as written by our composer, Victoria Phillips.

The following tracks make up this OST:

01 - Genesis - 3:07
02 - Written Journey - 1:36
03 - Shipwrecked - 3:17
04 - Forgotten Majesty - 3:19
05 - Enigma - 3:21
06 - Foolish Deeds - 1:20
07 - Alchemy - 1:48
08 - Hollow - 3:24
09 - First Secret - 2:18
10 - Forlorn Ground - 3:10
11 - Truth Concealed - 1:23
12 - Treacherous Path - 1:41
13 - Passage - 1:21
14 - Brewing Evil - 3:06
15 - Evinco - 1:44
16 - Solemn Waltz - 1:47
17 - Academy of Enchantment - 1:41
18 - Fallen Prince - 1:33
19 - Perished - 0:17
20 - Truth Concealed (Piano Solo) - 0:50
21 - Trailer - 1:33
22 - Fin - 0:48
